title: Review Preliminary Title Report
description: The TC has received the preliminary title report and must review it for any issues or exceptions.

tasks.description: Scan the report for any liens, encumbrances, or easements that might affect the property.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the report and identifies a mechanic's lien from a previous contractor.

tasks.description: Send the report to the buyer's agent for their review.
tasks.expected_outcome: The full report is forwarded to the agent.

tasks.description: Notify the listing agent and title company about the identified lien and ask how it will be cleared before closing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The TC communicates the issue to the relevant parties to ensure it is resolved.
